description: This table contains patient isolation data.

columns.name: ISOLATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the isolation record.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_2_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status category ID for the isolation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for the contact in which this isolation took place. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: ISOLATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The isolation type category ID for the isolation.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ISOLATION_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The isolation status category ID for the isolation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Removed


Deleted


Encounter Ended

columns.name: HOW_ISO_ADDED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The How Isolation Was Added category ID for the isolation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Import


Interface


Conversion


Automatic (ADT Rules)


Isolation Order

columns.name: ISOLATION_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the order that added the isolation.

columns.name: ADDED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the isolation was added.

columns.name: ADDED_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for the user who added this isolation. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: REMOVED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC date and time when the isolation was removed.

columns.name: REMOVED_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record for the user who removed this isolation. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The user-entered comments associated with the isolation

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the isolation record was created.

columns.name: ADDED_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: Local instant when isolation was added.

columns.name: REMOVED_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: Local instant when isolation was removed.

columns.name: INFECTION_LINKS_CALCULATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether all linked infections have been calculated. 'Y' indicates all linked infections have been calculated. 'N' or NULL indicates that there may be infections that would be considered linked to the isolation, but that the isolation pre-dates the linking calculation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
